name: Loader Heart
cssRules: .lds-heart{display:inline-block;position:relative;width:80px;height:80px;transform:rotate(45deg);transform-origin:40px 40px}.lds-heart div{top:32px;left:32px;position:absolute;width:32px;height:32px;background:#fafafa;animation:lds-heart 1.2s infinite cubic-bezier(.215,.61,.355,1)}.lds-heart div:after,.lds-heart div:before{content:' ';position:absolute;display:block;width:32px;height:32px;background:#fafafa}.lds-heart div:before{left:-24px;border-radius:50% 0 0 50%}.lds-heart div:after{top:-24px;border-radius:50% 50% 0 0}@keyframes lds-heart{0%{transform:scale(.95)}5%{transform:scale(1.1)}39%{transform:scale(.85)}45%{transform:scale(1)}60%{transform:scale(.95)}100%{transform:scale(.9)}}
